description: The saltiness of the bacon in this potato salad is complimented by the creaminess of the ranch
name: Bacon & Ranch Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the baby potatoes in a baking tray and drizzle with oil and seasoning and bake for 20 minutes or until fully cooked.
In a nonstick pan on a medium heat, fry the lardons and red onion for 5 minutes and then set to one side.
Once the cooked ingredients have cooled slightly, combine all ingredients toether before serving and garnish with chives.
